allow: Bash(node -e "const https = require\(''https''\); const options = { hostname: ''api.figma.com'', port: 443, path: ''/v1/images/unTYs0Gy3ImXcfyPXD4Ewp?ids=1240-6463&format=png&scale=2'', method: ''GET'', headers: { ''X-Figma-Token'': process.env.EXPO_PUBLIC_FIGMA_TOKEN } }; https.request\(options, res => { let data = ''''; res.on\(''data'', chunk => data += chunk\); res.on\(''end'', \(\) => console.log\(data\)\); }\).end\(\);")
